Package com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.usb.serial

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    RobotUsbDeviceTty
    RobotUsbDeviceTty is an implementation of RobotUsbDevice that sits on top of a serial file handle (such as /dev/tty) and presents the persona of a (fake) USB device.
    RobotUsbManagerTty
    RobotUsbManagerTty is a RobotUsbManager that manages the (single) embedded 'USB' device that lives on a serial port.
    SerialPort
    SerialPort is a simple wrapper around some native code that give us access to serial ports.
